data.text: @dave_andersen All I can say is a genuine NICE!!
@dave_andersen Iâ€™ve been watching for the day it drops below 100 cases a day 😄

PA-wide hospital census: Using 15942 med/surg beds - 118 less than last Sunday, and the first time we've been under 16,000 since September (other than xmas).

Excellent continued progress. Both county + state are getting close to dropping from "Substantial" to "Moderate"

Allegheny County daily vaccines wiggle down to 451 1st+2nd doses, 358 booster doses/day
(5 day lagged 7 day avg)

Fully vaccinated %s:

Allegheny County: 67.3% (state data), 48.9% of those are boosted.

PA counties with full ICU beds:

Northumberland (2 +covid patients in ICU)
Clearfield (3)

Pennsylvania reports 631 new cases.
Hospitalizations are -31 to 1058.
ICUs are -6 to 193 (80% full).
7 day avg drops to 1024-1042 cases/day
Transmission risk: Substantial

Today's results reflect 19300 new PCR test results https://t.co/oox8N5Jwzh
